      • activateEmptyObjectInstance

        View activateEmptyObjectInstance(String lodDefName)
                                 throws UnknownLodDefException
        Activates an empty Object Instance for the specified LOD name. The LOD must be defined in the default application for this task.
        Parameters:
        lodDefName - name of the LOD
        Returns:
        an empty OI.
        Throws:
        UnknownLodDefException

      • activateEmptyObjectInstance

        View activateEmptyObjectInstance(String lodDefName,
                               String appName)
                                 throws UnknownLodDefException
        Activates an empty Object Instance for the specified LOD name. The LOD must be defined in the application that is defined.
        Parameters:
        lodDefName - name of the LOD
        appName - name of the application that defines the LOD.
        Returns:
        an empty OI.
        Throws:
        UnknownLodDefException

      • activateEmptyObjectInstance

        View activateEmptyObjectInstance(String lodDefName,
                               Application app)
                                 throws UnknownLodDefException
        Activates an empty Object Instance for the specified LOD name. The LOD must be defined in the application that is defined.
        Parameters:
        lodDefName - name of the LOD
        app - the application that defines the LOD.
        Returns:
        an empty OI.
        Throws:
        UnknownLodDefException

      • activateEmptyObjectInstance

        View activateEmptyObjectInstance(LodDef lodDef)
        Activates an empty Object Instance for the specified LOD definition. The application does not need to be specified because it can be inferred from the LodDef.
        Parameters:
        lodDefName - name of the LOD
        Returns:
        an empty OI.

      • serializeOi

        SerializeOi serializeOi()
        Creates a serializer for this task that can be used to serialize multiple OIs to a stream. See SerializeOi for more.
        Returns:
        a new serializer.

      • getViewByName

        View getViewByName(String name)
        Retrieves a view by name for this task. Returns null if a name does not exist.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the view
        Returns:
        Named view or null

      • getViewByKey

        View getViewByKey(long key)
        Returns a view by a unique, internal key that is assigned to every view.
        Parameters:
        key - unique view key
        Returns:
        view or null.

      • readZeidonConfig

        String readZeidonConfig(String group,
                      String key)
        Retrieves a value from the Zeidon configuration for the default application. The default configuration is a zeidon.ini defined in the JVM classpath. This can be overridden for each application when the Object Engine is initialized.
        Parameters:
        group - name of the configuration group
        key - name of the configuration key
        Returns:
        configuration value as a string or null if not found.

      • readZeidonConfig

        String readZeidonConfig(String group,
                      String key,
                      String defaultValue)
        Retrieves a value from the Zeidon configuration for the default application. The default configuration is a zeidon.ini defined in the JVM classpath. This can be overridden for each application when the Object Engine is initialized.
        Parameters:
        group - name of the configuration group
        key - name of the configuration key
        Returns:
        configuration value as a string or defaultValue if not found.

      • readZeidonConfig

        String readZeidonConfig(String applicationName,
                      String group,
                      String key,
                      String defaultValue)
        Retrieves a value from the Zeidon configuration for the specified application. The default configuration is a zeidon.ini defined in the JVM classpath. This can be overridden for each application when the Object Engine is initialized.
        Parameters:
        group - name of the configuration group
        key - name of the configuration key
        Returns:
        configuration value as a string or null if not found.

      • readZeidonConfig

        String readZeidonConfig(Application application,
                      String group,
                      String key,
                      String defaultValue)
        Retrieves a value from the Zeidon configuration for the specified application. The default configuration is a zeidon.ini defined in the JVM classpath. This can be overridden for each application when the Object Engine is initialized.
        Parameters:
        group - name of the configuration group
        key - name of the configuration key
        Returns:
        configuration value as a string or defaultValue if not found.

      • getObjectEngine

        ObjectEngine getObjectEngine()
        Get the Object Engine that contains this task.
        Returns:
        the object engine.

      • getTempDirectory

        String getTempDirectory()
        Gets the temp directory for this task. For now this uses java.io.tmpdir.
